text: it's winter or nearly winter and you
want ribs and you want smoky ribs can
you get them we know you can make oven
baked ribs but can you make smoky oven
baked ribs the answer is yes who's gonna
make them you it's not going to be that
hard it's going to take 3 hours 2 hours
and 50 minutes of which is you sitting
around reading the newspaper whatever it
is you wanted watching football whatever
it is you want to do start with a big
roasting pan fitted with a rack these
have to be the rack has to fit nicely in
here ok and they both need to be big and
this needs to be deep and a bag of wood
chips and you can go in your backyard
and gather these if you want as long as
you know the quality of the wood in your
backyard a nice even layer like this and
then you want to moisturize barely
covering them put your rack on top of
your chips you should not have water
coming up to the bottom of the rack put
your rib rack right here fits nice
it already smells great and nothing's
happened yet now the fun begins you have
to build a tent around here the idea is
to build a closed system so that the
steam and the smoke that arise from the
moistened chips stay inside and permeate
permeate the ribs
you're gonna cook this slowly 225
degrees for like 3 hours look at them
they look great they're nicely browned
you can see they're juicy you find that
seam in between the bones here you go
I'm pretty happy with these
